links.description: The market continues to rise at a torrid pace, and the S&P 500 is now up by over 4 percent for the first 9 trading days of 2018. But it is not the technology group leading the markets higher in 2018, its energy and consumer discretionary stocks, which have already surged by 7.3 and 6.4 percent.

links.title: Tesla Inc(NASDAQ:TSLA): Tesla Inc (TSLA) Finds A New Commercial Powerpack Client In France | StockNews.com
links.description: Neyrial says that Tesla delivered a Powerpack v1.5 with a capacity of 100 kWh and a Tesla commercial inverter with a capacity of 50 kW. It's a lower energy version of Tesla's Powerpack 2.0, which can have a capacity up to 210 kWh in the same package.

links.description: Tesla Stock can rally significantly higher, but Tesla is currently a battleground stock. So far short sellers have been completely wrong and they have had their accounts blown up :) Where do you think Tesla stock is headed?

links.title: Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) - Vetr Crowd Downgrades Tesla
links.description: The Vetr community on Tuesday downgraded its rating on Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) from 3.5 stars (Buy) to 3 stars (Hold). Crowd confidence at the time of the change was slightly bearish with 59 percent of users giving the stock a "Sell" rating.
